Name: Arataki Itto
Title: "Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto
Source: Reward for inviting Arataki Itto to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

C116051.Name: Ushi
C116051.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character takes DMG: </color>Decrease DMG taken by 1.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>. When the Usage is depleted, this card will not be discarded.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Can be triggered once while this Summon is present: </color>When your character takes DMG, $[A1605] gains $[K1007].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Discard this card, deal 1 $[K106].

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K1007.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Superlative Superstrength</color>
K1007.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>: </color>Deal +1 DMG. If the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> are no less than 2, then costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

C116054.Name: Superlative Superstrength
C116054.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a $[K51]: </color>Deal +1 DMG. If there are at least 2 $[K3], spend 1 less $[K309].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.

16053.Name: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!

C116053.Name: Raging Oni King
C116053.Desc: The character to which this is attached has their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG, and their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K106].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> Gains $[K1007]. (Once per Round)

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
